'There are three trips that you take to India:

The one you think you are going to have-that you actually plan

the one you actually have;

And the you live through once you go back home'

INDIA

With more than 30000 years of history, India is the birthplace of numerous cultures and religions making it most important tourist destination in the world.
Being ruled over verious dynasties and kingdoms beforebeing established as a republic in 20th century, India has more than thousand tourist attractions

Listed below are some of the most extravagant places that you can visit in India
